## [Commands](..%2F..%2F..%2Fcommands%2FREADME.md): sky create [(Source)](..%2F..%2F..%2Fcommands%2Fdocs%2Fsky-create-project%2F)

  
### Sky create project

Requires: pnpm

Create project folder, init package.json, get and run create command

```sh
mkdir ${PROJECT_FOLDER}
cd ${PROJECT_FOLDER}
pnpm init
pnpm install tsx
sky create

```
